alert.note: Alert for Buckingham (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 8:29PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Buckingham County through 915 PM EDT... At 827 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bent Creek, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wingina... and Centenary. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
